name: Luca Is Scared Of Bobby
description:
Luca Is Scared Of Bobby is a fun, action packed, funny and very loud game!

Now, At first sight this game may seem like a dumb and boring game but it is surprisingly addictive and fun. Just try it out!

You are a block that moves left to right, avoiding obstacles. Your goal? Reach the end of the level. Why? Why not.

Small monthly updates soon

Discord: https://discord.gg/HpMa37sAYX
